articles.title: Biden scraps plans to nominate conservative anti-abortion lawyer to federal judgeship

articles.title: Ivana Trump's death ruled accidental by medical examiner
articles.description: Ivana Trump, an ex-wife of former President Donald Trump, died of "blunt impact injuries" to the torso, New York City's medical examiner said Friday.

articles.author: Katelyn Polantz, CNN Reporter, Crime and Justice
articles.title: John Eastman loses emergency request to protect his phone data from DOJ investigators
articles.description: A federal judge in New Mexico won't step in to protect Trump attorney John Eastman's seized cell phone from Justice Department investigators, after Eastman was searched as part of a January 6-related criminal inquiry.

articles.title: Video: Michael Cohen says Trump is 'melting down' - CNN Video
articles.description: Michael Cohen, former President Donald Trump's one-time personal lawyer, says that Trump's reported call to a January 6 committee witness signals to him that Trump is 'melting down'.
